title: Factory reset options (with and without FRP)
content:
Hi

I'm trying to understand how to achieve Factory Reset types, with and without Factory Reset Protection (FRP)

ie.
1. Full factory reset, so when I reboot, only my google account can be used (FRP)
2. Full Factory reset, so that another google account can be set up on it (eg. when selling)

I dont want to FR just yet (so reluctant to experiment)

Which are the respective options to do the 2 above types of FR please?

Thanks
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 5
